data.event: The county was surveyed in 1843 and organized in 1861.
The county was surveyed in 1843 and organized in 1861.
The 2010 United States Census indicates Delta County had population of 37,069.

event.title: a decrease of 1,451 people from the 2000

data.event: This is a decrease of 1,451 people from the 2000 United States Census.
